Class CarpetCalculator

java.lang.Object
  CarpetCalculator

public class CarpetCalculator
extends java.lang.Object

Class that describes the fields and methods(behaviours) required to calculate the total cost of a carpet for a room

Version:
v1.0 Oct 20, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

pluralize

public java.lang.String pluralize(double roomDimension)
Method pluralize which returns the plural or non-plural form of the unit used to measure the room, feet or foot

Parameters:
roomDimension - A parameter representing the dimension, length or width, of the room object
Returns:
The return value which is feet if the dimension is greater than 1, or foot if the dimension is 1
